typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	logger as boolean (false())
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split($logger,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(logon, logoff)
ConditionalSplit1@logon aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> RowCount
ConditionalSplit1@logoff sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
RowCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rowcount.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LogRowCount
